section.title: Affected languages
section.para: Scripting languages are more affected by these security concerns:

section.title: Execution UID
section.para: GNU/Linux don't allow set scripts SUID.

section.title: Input values
section.para: Don't assume input values belong to a set of characters. Be careful or discard inputs composed by:

section.title: Scripts
section.para: Be very careful including external files (e.g. Perl eval sentence)

section.title: CGIs
section.para: To avoid code injection problems, each CGI GET or POST parameters must be checked to discard dangerous input values.

section.title: General system calls
section.para: system, exec, reverse quotes in bash or perl
